MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling, affecting properties in Easterton Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 11:32PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57PM on 28 March 2021.
